CustomField.description: Maximum stack depth for chained queueable jobs. Set to 0 to use Salesforce defaults (recommended for production/sandbox). Set to 50+ for scratch/developer orgs to override the default limit of 5.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Developer/scratch orgs have a 5-job chain limit. Set this to 50+ to override. Production/sandbox orgs don't need this (leave at 0). Only applies when using Queueable dispatch (Low async type).
CustomField.label: Max Queueable Stack Depth
